ancient_wisdom_introduction.name: Ancient Wisdom Introduction
ancient_wisdom_introduction.description: Introduction to the spiritual and philosophical foundations of intimacy based on Vatsyayana's Kama Sutra
ancient_wisdom_introduction.instructions: Welcome to the ancient wisdom of love and intimacy. In this sacred space, we explore the four goals of life: Dharma (righteousness), Artha (prosperity), Kama (love and pleasure), and Moksha (liberation). The Kama Sutra teaches that love is not merely physical but a spiritual journey of connection, respect, and mutual growth.
cues: Sit together in a quiet, sacred space facing each other
Take three deep breaths together, synchronizing your breathing
Listen to the ancient wisdom of love and spiritual connection
Understand that intimacy is a sacred act of unity and respect
Feel the timeless wisdom flowing between your hearts
Recognize that love is both physical pleasure and spiritual growth
Honor each other as sacred beings on this journey together

sama_sparsha_simple_embrace.name: Sama-Sparsha (Simple Embrace)
sama_sparsha_simple_embrace.description: Authentic Kama Sutra embrace technique with gentle body-to-body contact and matched breathing
sama_sparsha_simple_embrace.instructions: Practice the ancient Sama-Sparsha embrace with gentle body-to-body contact and synchronized breathing.
cues: Stand facing each other
Begin with gentle eye contact
Move into a gentle embrace
Focus on matched breathing
Feel the energy flowing between you

ancient_breathing_techniques.name: Ancient Breathing Techniques
ancient_breathing_techniques.description: Traditional pranayama breathing practices for intimacy, connection, and energy flow
ancient_breathing_techniques.instructions: The ancient texts teach that synchronized breathing creates a powerful energetic connection between partners. This practice, known as 'Sahaj Pranayama' (natural breath), helps align your energies and deepen your bond. As you breathe together, you create a sacred space of unity and harmony.
cues: Sit facing each other, close enough to feel each other's breath
Place your hands on each other's hearts, feeling the rhythm
Begin with slow, deep breaths together - inhale for 4 counts
Hold the breath for 4 counts, feeling the energy build
Exhale slowly for 6 counts, releasing tension and stress
Focus on synchronizing your breathing rhythm perfectly
Feel the prana (life force) flowing between your bodies
Maintain gentle eye contact and breathe as one being
Notice how your hearts begin to beat in harmony

front_embrace_pillow_support.name: Front Embrace (Pillow Support)
front_embrace_pillow_support.description: Authentic Kama Sutra position with detailed parameters for intimacy, stimulation, and safety
front_embrace_pillow_support.instructions: Practice the Front Embrace position with pillow support for optimal comfort and stimulation.
cues: Set up pillow support for comfort
Align bodies for optimal contact
Begin with gentle movement
Focus on the stimulation points
Maintain communication throughout

tantric_breathing_techniques.name: Tantric Breathing Techniques
tantric_breathing_techniques.description: Advanced breathing techniques for spiritual and physical union
tantric_breathing_techniques.instructions: Practice advanced tantric breathing techniques to enhance spiritual and physical connection.
cues: Sit facing each other
Begin with synchronized breathing
Focus on the energy flow
Connect with your partner's breath
Feel the divine energy rising

energy_channeling_practice.name: Energy Channeling Practice
energy_channeling_practice.description: Advanced energy work for spiritual and physical union
energy_channeling_practice.instructions: Practice advanced energy channeling techniques to enhance spiritual and physical connection.
cues: Sit in a comfortable position
Focus on your energy centers
Channel energy through your body
Connect with your partner's energy
Feel the divine energy flowing

relationship_health_assessment.name: Relationship Health Assessment
relationship_health_assessment.description: Comprehensive assessment of relationship wellness and intimacy health based on ancient wisdom
relationship_health_assessment.instructions: This sacred assessment helps you evaluate your relationship's health across multiple dimensions. The ancient texts teach that a healthy relationship requires balance in physical intimacy, emotional connection, spiritual alignment, and mutual respect. Take time to honestly reflect on each aspect together.
cues: Sit together comfortably in a quiet, private space
Hold hands and take three deep breaths together
Reflect on your emotional connection - how do you feel when together?
Assess your communication - do you feel heard and understood?
Evaluate your physical intimacy - is it satisfying for both partners?
Consider your spiritual connection - do you share values and dreams?
Identify areas where you both want to grow and improve
Create a plan for continued growth and deeper connection
Express gratitude for each other and your journey together

standing_hold_wall_support.name: Standing Hold (Wall Support)
standing_hold_wall_support.description: Authentic standing position with wall support for stability and intimacy
standing_hold_wall_support.instructions: Practice the Standing Hold position with wall support for stability and intimacy.
cues: Position with wall support
Ensure stable footing
Begin with gentle movement
Maintain balance and communication
Focus on the connection
